mapper.update:
update t_sys_user
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_question = #{userQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_title = #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_sys_user set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_question = #{userQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_title = #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT U.`uuid`,U.`user_account`,U.`user_name`,U.`user_code`,U.`user_email`, U.`user_phone`,U.`user_sex`,U.`user_title`, R.`role_uuid`,O.`org_uuid` FROM t_sys_user U JOIN t_sys_user_role R ON U.`uuid`=R.`user_uuid` JOIN t_sys_user_organization O ON U.`uuid`=R.`user_uuid` WHERE U.user_account=#{userName} and U.user_pwd=#{userPwd}
